dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.service.serv.cfs.CustomerFacingServiceComposite
dataStructure.description:
This is an abstract base class that defines an integrated set of CustomerFacingServices that collectively meets the needs of a Product. For example, the Customer may have requested "GoldService", which is a ServicePackage that defines a set of ServiceBundles, each of which has its own QoS. This enables "GoldService" to be abstracted and treated as a managed object that provides a CustomerFacingService.

This entity is abstract

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: CustomerFacingServiceComposite

child.name: customerFacingService
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is an end of association CFSCompositeHasCFServices

This association end is optional
child.label: customerFacingService
